name: FLC 2022 Pro
description:
Love action arcade soccer but lack the time to practice? 

Play the brand new football game FLC 2022 Pro and enjoy the insanely real, ultra-fast and immersive football experience!

The new FLC 2022’s very easy to learn game controls allows you to jump-start the fun. Just flick your finger across the screen to kick the ball and score a goal! As you progress through the game, shots become more challenging and you’ll need a solid strategy to bend shots and split defenses. Be the hero in every match.

Download to play today and score big!
